# Publish SHA256 checksums for release artifacts

**Labels:** `type:feature`, `prio:high`  
**Milestone:** v0.6 â€” Supply-chain, UX polish, Open-source hygiene  
**Epic:** Release integrity & provenance

## Description

Make binaries trustworthy for enterprise adoption. Providing checksums allows users to verify download integrity and detect tampering.

## Acceptance Criteria

- Each GitHub release includes `checksums.txt`
- Docs show how to verify checksums on Windows/macOS/Linux

## Notes

Checksums are essential for security-conscious organizations. This is a low-effort, high-value addition to the release process.
